messages.title: ELECTION 2015
messages.content: A Labour win on 7 May will be a victory for change. Labour will govern for all of the country. Not just the wealthy elite who have seen their wealth grow under David Cameron's stewardship of 10 Downing Street and the Con/Lib coalition.
By voting Labour we can get rid of this Conservative led Coalition Government. A Labour government will end the politics of punishing the poor and disadvantaged.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A fairer tax system with a 50p top rate for the wealthiest earners.
A living wage for the half a million Scots who work full time but can't make ends meet.
Real and much needed investment in our NHS.
Pensions with the Minimum Pension Guarantee.
A national £8 an hour National Minimum Wage.
Stop spiralling energy prices and end the exploitation of zero hour contracts. Only a Labour Government can deliver social justice.

issues.health: Real and much needed investment in our NHS.
issues.socialWelfare: By voting Labour we can get rid of this Conservative led Coalition Government. A Labour government will end the politics of punishing the poor and disadvantaged.

leaflet.personalStatement: As the Scottish Labour Party candidate for the General Election which will take place on 7 May Jim is seeking your support to return him to Parliament as your MP and a Labour Government to power by removing David Cameron's Conservative led coalition government.

politicalExperience.role: MP for Clydesdale Constituency, MP for Lanark & Hamilton East
politicalExperience.duration: first elected 11 June 1987, re-elected in 2005 and 2010

endorsements.endorsement: Mentions past contributions to Labour's policy.

images.caption: Jim Hood - Labour's Candidate for Lanark & Hamilton East

leaflet.additionalNotes: Scottish Labour values are your values; Social Justice and Fairness for all Scots. We will govern for the many not the few.
